title: Question 1:
description: How can I yield farm or earn $YFI?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The initial distribution of YFI was held during 1 week and was only available farming (providing liquidity) in 1 of the 3 pools created for this.
At this time no more $YFI is going to be minted so there isn't any way to farm it.
Currently the total supply is capped at the 30,000 already in circulation
